titles.title: National All-Payer Claims Database Act of 2022
National All-Payer Claims Database Act of 2022

To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award a contract to an eligible nonprofit entity to establish and maintain a health care claims database for purposes of lowering Americans' health care costs, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
National All-Payer Claims Database Act of 2022
This bill establishes a national all-payer claims database to collect and publish health care claims and payment information from various insurers.
